title: Language Problems with new Forum
body:
Hey there,

I am stumped as to how I can set my default language for these forums to English.
Since I am currently in Germany the boards want me to use German and seemingly can't be convinced to change that -.-

I tried clicking on "Westeuropa (Deutsch)" and then select "Westeuropa (English)" but all that does is cause the site to reload the "Westeuropa (Deutsch)" view.

So how I get out of here? Thanks in advance

replies.body: I think deleting Cookies & Cache will fix the "Select and Reload"-Problem.

I think so, but then I did this after having manually accessed the english boards via url-changes and signing out & in again, so all I can say that the combination of all that at least seems to work ;) but I guess the cookie-thing alone should suffice

You could try typing "http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/ " into your search bar.
I don't know if this will change your default language, though.
